objTypes.name: Greeting
objTypes.wordTrack:
Hello, may I speak with [customerName] please?

They reply this is he/she.

Good morning / afternoon [customerName], this is [yourName] with [yourCompany] and I'm calling to wish you a happy birthday!

objTypes.name: Greeting
objTypes.wordTrack:
Hello, may I speak with [customerName] please?

They reply this is he/she.

Good morning / afternoon [customerName], this is [yourName] with [yourCompany] and I'm calling to remind you of your upcoming appointment at [day / time].

objTypes.name: Cancelling
objTypes.objection: I'm sorry, I'm not going to be able to make this appt.
objTypes.wordTrack: Not a problem.  I'll go ahead and cancel your appointment.  I have openings later this week, or we can reschedule for a later date. What works best for you?
